name: CHUPSHMUP
description:
Are you CHUP? Are you trying to bring down CHUP?

The world may never know, as we ran out of time for that!

WASD or Arrow keys or Joystick to move.

Left click, Ctrl, or A to fire.

Uploaded the source folder in case anyone wants to see how any of it was done. 

A lot of the code was written quickly with cut corners on good design and during long stretches. Basically: code is not indicative of standard coding quality and be warned of bad practices such as copy pasted code.
